thread.section_title: Amalfi Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel with a great staff
thread.title_full: Nice hotel with a great staff - Review of Amalfi Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Brandywiner
title: Nice hotel with a great staff
text:
This is a very nice property on a busy street. The windows however keep the noise level in check. The room was adequately sized and the bed was very comfortable. the bath facilities were modern and clean.
What makes the hotel exceptional were the people but at the front desk and in the kitchen. The breakfast was quite tasty with sweet rolls, salami, cheese, yogurt, eggs and juice. The chef was loveable, outgoing and funny.
